tasks.test:dev: deno task redis:start && deno task test || redis-cli SHUTDOWN
tasks.bench:dev: deno task redis:start && deno task bench
tasks.ok: deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno task test
tasks.ok:dev: deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno task test:dev
tasks.update:dev: deno run -A https://deno.land/x/udd/main.ts --test="deno task ok:dev" mod.ts test.ts
tasks.update: deno run -A https://deno.land/x/udd/main.ts --test="deno task ok" mod.ts test.ts
